Method Detail

assemble

public void assemble()
Assemble.

firstPass

public void firstPass()
First pass. Takes every assemblyline and inputs symbols in SymbolTable. Also checks for literals. Stores all lines in the arraylist InterMediateLines for easier handling in pass two

secondPass

public void secondPass()
Second pass.

searchLiterals

public void searchLiterals(AL assemblyLine)
Checks if operand is LTORG or END, and if found does literal pooling (assingning addresses to the literals not yet assigned an address) Also search for literals and inserts them to LITTAB

Parameters:
assemblyLine - the assembly line

insertLiterals

public void insertLiterals()
Declares the literals from the LITTAB into the objectCode.

makeObjectCode

public java.lang.String makeObjectCode(AL assemblyLine)
                                throws java.io.IOException
Makes object code from sourcecode. Checks format, and if the x, or e flag is set Also checks to see if its PC or BasePossible, and creates its correspondig object code First checks the N and I flag(N=1 I=1 or N=1 I=0 or N=0 I=1 or N=0 I=0) then proceeds to check the X, B, P and E flags

Parameters:
assemblyLine - who contains sourcecode to be processed
Returns:
the string objectCode
Throws:
java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
